title: போலீஸ் வேடத்தில் இருந்த நபர் ஏ.பி.வி.பி நிர்வாகியா? டெல்லி போலீஸ் மறுப்பு!
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Despite the clarification by Delhi Police that the personnel is NOT an ABVP karyakarta, some media houses are still peddling the defamatory allegations without verifying with the Delhi Police or ABVP. They should retract the news and apologise immediately. https://t.co/ema6FoiJRN
